### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (60.0, -60.0)) 
-  BurnerInserter (position (60.5, -61.5)) 
-  BurnerInserter (position (61.5, -61.5)) 
-  Chest (position (62.5, -61.5)) 
-  BurnerInserter (position (62.5, -60.5))

### Electricity generator at position(111.5, -30.5)
Consists of 
-  OffshorePump (position (107.5, -33.5)) 
-  PipeGroup (fluid_system=141615, position=(107.5, -34.5)) 
-  Boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)) 
-  PipeGroup (fluid_system=141617, position=(111.5, -33.5)) 
-  Generator (position (117.5, -30.5)) 
-  SmallElectricPole (position (119.5, -30.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate.
-  Ensure the burner inserter has source items to pick up.
-  Ensure the burner inserter has a clear path to drop items.

### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt.

### Errors when using boiler
-  Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to operate.

### Errors when using generator
-  Ensure the generator has input liquid.
-  Ensure the generator has fluid present in connections.

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  No important variables have been assigned.
